name: New Member Alert
subject: Voter Registered!

message:
* {{ doc.voter_id }} - {{ doc.voter_name }} Just Voted!*
Of course we are not gonna tell you their choice. It's the whole point of a secret ballot!
This message helps you track turnout to avoid bots. 
If you can verify the name of the person and the turnout, then you know it's a valid record in the system!

*Current Turnout*:  {{ doc.current_tally }}

NB: Election is ongoing, so this value changes rapidly.
